name: colposcopy
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a medical examination of the cervix (= the lower part of the womb that leads into the vagina) using a special instrument: If the results are positive, the patient will be sent for a colposcopy. Further evaluation is by colposcopy if required.
More examplesFewer examplesThe study found that older women waited longer than younger women to get a colposcopy.The majority of Australian women will be referred for a colposcopy at some point in their life.A patient with an abnormal smear test should undergo colposcopy. The treatment is usually carried out with the use of colposcopy.Gynaecology clinics are held on two afternoons for performing colposcopies and other procedures.
